00047 uiStuff::uiStuff(QoccHarnessWindow* window) {
00048   theWindow = window;
00049   slotNeutralSelection();
00050   addSelectionWidgets();
00051 }

00054   theWindow->getView()->Redraw();

00057 
00058 void uiStuff::getSelection() {
00059   selectedShapes.clear();
00060   for ( theWindow->getContext()->InitSelected(); theWindow->getContext()->MoreSelected(); theWindow->getContext()->NextSelected() ) {
00061     Handle_AIS_InteractiveObject IO = theWindow->getContext()->Interactive();
00062     if ( !theWindow->getContext()->HasSelectedShape() )
00063     {
00064       infoMsg("no selection");
00065       //                        theWindow->getContext()->ClearSelected();
00066       //                        break;
00067     }
00068     if ( IO->IsKind(STANDARD_TYPE(AIS_Trihedron)) )
00069     {
00070       //we don't want to save the trihedron
00071       //clearSelected apparently clears EVERYTHING, rather than deselecting one thing...
00072       continue;
00073     }
00074     selectedShapes.push_back(theWindow->getContext()->SelectedShape());
00075   }
00076   cout << "selectedShapes.size(): " << selectedShapes.size() << endl;
00077 }

00081 //normally called like this: debugMsg("error string",__FILE__,__LINE__);
00082 void uiStuff::debugMsg(QString s, QString f, int l) {
00083   errors++;
00084   cerr << "Error  #" << errors << ": " << s.toStdString() << "\n\tin file " << f.toStdString() << " at line " << l << "." << endl;
00085 }

00116 QString uiStuff::toString(float a,float b, float c) {
00117   return QString("%1, %2, %3").arg(a).arg(b).arg(c);
00118 }
00119 
00120 QString uiStuff::toString(gp_Pnt p) {
00121   return QString("%1, %2, %3").arg(p.X()).arg(p.Y()).arg(p.Z());
00122 }
00123 
00124 QString uiStuff::toString(gp_Dir d) {
00125   QString str;
00126   Standard_Real angTol = 0.000175;      //approx .01 degrees
00127   if(d.IsParallel( gp_Dir(0,0,1), angTol ) ){
00128     str = "Z axis";
00129   } else if (d.IsParallel( gp_Dir(0,1,0), angTol ) ) {
00130     str = "Y axis";
00131   } else if (d.IsParallel( gp_Dir(1,0,0), angTol ) ) {
00132     str = "X axis";
00133   } else if (d.IsNormal( gp_Dir(0,0,1), angTol ) ) {
00134     str = QString("horizontal, (%1, %2, %3)").arg(d.X()).arg(d.Y()).arg(d.Z());
00135   } else {
00136     str = QString("(%1, %2, %3)").arg(d.X()).arg(d.Y()).arg(d.Z());
00137   }
00138   return str;
00139 }
00140 
00141 void uiStuff::checkShapeType(TopoDS_Shape Shape)
00142 {
00143   QString str;
00144   if (Shape.IsNull()) {
00145     str = "null";
00146   } else if (Shape.ShapeType()==TopAbs_EDGE) {
00147     str = "edge";
00148   } else if (Shape.ShapeType()==TopAbs_FACE) {
00149     str = "face";
00150   } else if (Shape.ShapeType()==TopAbs_WIRE) {
00151     str = "wire";
00152   } else if (Shape.ShapeType()==TopAbs_SHAPE) {
00153     str = "shape";
00154   } else if (Shape.ShapeType()==TopAbs_COMPOUND) {
00155     str = "compound";
00156   } else if (Shape.ShapeType()==TopAbs_COMPSOLID) {
00157     str = "compsolid";
00158   } else if (Shape.ShapeType()==TopAbs_SOLID) {
00159     str = "solid";
00160   } else if (Shape.ShapeType()==TopAbs_SHELL) {
00161     str = "shell";
00162   } else if (Shape.ShapeType()==TopAbs_VERTEX) {
00163     str = "vertex";
00164   } else {
00165     str = "borked";
00166   }
00167   infoMsg("The shape is: " + str + ".");
00168 }

00170 void uiStuff::slotNeutralSelection()
00171 {
00172   theWindow->getContext()->CloseAllContexts();
00173 }
00174 
00175 void uiStuff::slotVertexSelection()
00176 {
00177   theWindow->getContext()->CloseAllContexts();
00178   theWindow->getContext()->OpenLocalContext();
00179   theWindow->getContext()->ActivateStandardMode(TopAbs_VERTEX);
00180 }

00183 {
00184   theWindow->getContext()->CloseAllContexts();
00185   theWindow->getContext()->OpenLocalContext();

00187 }

00203 void uiStuff::addSelectionWidgets() {
00204   QMenu *selectMenu;
00205   selectMenu = new QMenu("Select");
00206   theWindow->menuBar()->insertMenu(theWindow->getHelpMenu(),selectMenu);  //put this menu BEFORE the help menu
00207   //    theWindow->menuBar()->addMenu(selectMenu);
00208   
00209   QAction *selectNeutralAction;
00210   selectNeutralAction = new QAction("Neutral", this);
00211   //selectNeutralAction->setShortcut(QString("Ctrl+N"));
00212   selectNeutralAction->setStatusTip("Select Nothing");
00213   connect(selectNeutralAction, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(slotNeutralSelection()));
00214   selectMenu->addAction( selectNeutralAction );
00215   
00216   QAction *selectVertexAction;
00217   selectVertexAction = new QAction("Vertex", this);
00218   selectVertexAction->setStatusTip("Select Vertices");
00219   connect(selectVertexAction, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(slotVertexSelection()));
00220   selectMenu->addAction( selectVertexAction );
00221   
00222   QAction *selectEdgeAction;
00223   selectEdgeAction = new QAction("Edge", this);
00224   selectEdgeAction->setStatusTip("Select Edges");
00225   connect(selectEdgeAction, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(slotEdgeSelection()));
00226   selectMenu->addAction( selectEdgeAction );
00227   
00228   QAction *selectFaceAction;
00229   selectFaceAction = new QAction("Face", this);
00230   selectFaceAction->setStatusTip("Select Faces");
00231   connect(selectFaceAction, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(slotFaceSelection()));
00232   selectMenu->addAction( selectFaceAction );
00233   
00234   QAction *selectSolidAction;
00235   selectSolidAction = new QAction("Solid", this);
00236   selectSolidAction->setStatusTip("Select Solids");
00237   connect(selectSolidAction, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(slotSolidSelection()));
00238   selectMenu->addAction( selectSolidAction );
00239 }
